display_long_description:
Smart Connect brings your personal ecosystem together like never before. Designed for seamless multitasking and device control. Whether you're streaming apps, searching for files, or managing accessories, Smart Connect simplifies the way you interact with your devices.

Key features:
 • Pair your phone, tablet, and PC to unlock cross-device control
 • Connect to smart TVs and displays for a lean-back experience
 • Manage Motorola accessories like Buds and Tag from a single dashboard
 • Find files and apps instantly with cross-device search
 • Stream Android apps to your PC, tablet, or display
 • Use Share hub to transfer files and media between devices
 • Start Cross control to use your tablet as a second screen
 • Includes advanced features like Webcam and Mobile desktop
 • Now available on Meta Quest and third-party Android devices

A Windows 10 or 11 PC with Bluetooth and a compatible phone or tablet is required.
Smart Connect requires elevated permissions to install and use this app.
Feature compatibility may vary by device. Check if your phone or tablet is compatible:  
https://help.motorola.com/hc/apps/smartconnect/index.php?v=&t=help_pc_compatible
